articles.description: Biocon Biologics targets to tap a $30 billion U.S. insulin market with two interchangeable insulins.

articles.title: India's fastest start-up to hit billion-dollar status is already profitable, says founder - CNBC
articles.description: Indian start-up Mensa Brands, which has catapulted to billion-dollar unicorn status in just six months, is already profitable and on course for further growth, founder Anath Narayanan has told CNBC.
